Reference

All functions

AnnualCycle()

Plots an annual cycle

ChangeUnits()

Converts units from original Fluxnet to target ALMA units

CheckCSVTiming()

Checks that have whole number of days in dataset

CheckDataGaps()

Checks for missing and gap-filled data and determines output years

CheckDataRanges()

Checks that data are within specified ranges as set in the "variables" auxiliary file

Create2Uchar()

Creates time stamp string

CreateFluxNetcdfFile()

Creates a netcdf file for flux variables

CreateMetNetcdfFile()

Creates a netcdf file for met variables

CreateTimeunits()

Creates time unit

DayNight()

Finds day and night time steps

DiurnalCycle()

Plots a diurnal cycle

FillQCvarMissing()

Fills QC flags with 3 (poor gap-filling) when QC flag missing but data variable available

FindExcludeEval()

Finds evaluation variables to exlude

FindFluxInd()

Finds indices for flux variables to be outputted

FindTimeVarName()

Finds time variable name

GapfillFlux()

Gapfill flux variables using statistical methods

GapfillMet_statistical()

Gapfill meteorological variables using statistical methods

GapfillMet_with_ERA()

Gapfills meteorological data with down-scaled ERAinterim estimates

GetNumberTimesteps()

Gets the number of time steps

GetTimeUnits()

Gets time units

GetTimestepSize()

Gets time step size

GetTimingNcfile()

Gets NC file timing

InitialChecks()

Performs initial checks on function arguments

IsWholeYrs()

Checks that whole years were extracted

ReadCSVFluxData()

Reads comma-delimited text files containing Fluxnet2015 data

Rel2SpecHumidity()

Converts relative humidity to specific humidity.

SynthesizeLWdown()

Synthesises downward longwave radiation based on Tair and rel humidity

SynthesizePSurf()

Synthesises air pressure based on Tair and elevation

Timeseries()

Plots a smoothed and non-smoothed time seris

VPD2RelHum()

Converts VPD (hPa) to relative humidity (percentage)

Yeardays()

Finds number of days per year

add_processing_info()

Writes attributes common to met and flux NC files

add_processing_metadata()

Adds processor metadata, including processor version

aggregate_tsteps()

Aggregates original time resolution to a coarser time step

append_and_warn()

Appends warning message and calls warning

append_qc()

Appends information for new QC flag

calc_avPrecip()

Calculates mean annual precipitation

calc_esat()

Calculates saturation vapour pressure

celsius_to_kelvin()

Convert air temperature from Celsius to Kelvin

check_flx2015_version()

Checks that FLUXNET2015 version defined correctly

check_missing()

Checks which metadata are missing (correcting for OK NAs)

convertToHoursMins()

Utility function to convert minutes to HHMM format

convert_LaThuile()

Converts La Thuile files to FLUXNET2015 format

convert_LaThuile_time()

Converts La Thuile time format to Fluxnet2015 time format

convert_OzFlux()

Converts OzFlux files to FLUXNET2015 format

convert_fluxnet_to_netcdf()

ConvertSpreadsheetToNcdf.R

copyfill_data()

Performs copyfill gapfilling

create_dummy_year()

Function for filling missing years in La Thuile dataframe

create_outdir()

Creates output directories and returns log output path

create_qc_var()

Creates attributes for a new QC variable

define_model_params()

Writes model parameters as global attribute to NetCDF file

doydate()

Gets the day of month and month, given day of year

duplicate_columns()

Duplicates columns in Fluxnet data if a variable is being processes multiple times

findColIndices()

Finds variables present in input file

findStartTime()

Timing_general.R

findTimeInfo()

Extract time stamp information

find_ind_and_qc()

Find index for a variable and its QC flag

gapfill_LWdown_Pair()

Synthesizes incoming longwave radiation and air pressure

gapfill_with_ERA()

Gapfills met data

getMonthDays()

Gets month indices

get_default_conversion_options()

Default options for a dataset conversion

get_fluxdata_org_site_codes()

Get all available site codes from site_status table

get_fluxdata_org_site_metadata()

Get metadata from Fluxdata.org

get_fluxnet_erai_files()

Gets Fluxnet ERA Interim file(s) available at a given path

get_fluxnet_erai_template()

Gets a Fluxnet ERA interim file template (or full file name if site codes and years are specified)

get_fluxnet_file_template()

Gets a Fluxnet file template (or full file name if site codes and years are specified)

get_fluxnet_files()

Gets Fluxnet file(s) available at a given path

get_fluxnet_version_no()

Gets Fluxnet dataset version from Fluxnet file

get_git_version()

Gets the git version from the installed package See src/zzz.R for how git revision is discovered

get_lathuile_datapolicy()

Gets La Thuile data policy for each site year

get_ornl_site_codes()

Get all available site codes from site_status table

get_ornl_site_metadata()

Get metadata from ORNL

get_ornl_site_url_list()

Get a list of ORNL site URLs from site_status table

get_path_site_code()

Gets Fluxnet site_code from Fluxnet file. Useful when processing multiple files

get_qc_flags()

Retrieves QC flag information

get_site_code()

Get site name from metadata

get_site_fluxdata_org_url()

Get a single fluxdata_org site URL from site_status table

get_site_metadata()

Get site metadata. Tries multiple methods to retrieve full metadata

get_site_metadata_from_CSV()

Tries to gather metadata from the included site CSV

get_site_metadata_web()

Tries to load metadata from known Fluxnet info sources on the 'web

get_site_ornl_url()

Get a single ORNL site URL from site_status table

get_varnames()

Gets possible varnames for FLUXNET FULLSET/SUBSET and La Thuile

initialise_model()

Finds model-specific parameters to be written to output NetCDF files

initialise_sitelog()

Initialises site log

is.leap()

Finds leap years

linfill_data()

Performs linear interpolation gapfilling

log_error()

Append error message to log

log_warning()

Appends warning to site log

metadata_list_to_dataframe()

Convert a list of metadata lists to a dataframe

no_error()

Checks if an error has occurred

plot_nc()

Plots standard analysis plots from netcdf data

preprocess_OzFlux()

Pre-processes OzFlux files that have missing time steps or incomplete years First gapfills data to complete days (using copyfill) and then removes incomplete years

qc_frac()

Calculates fraction of good quality gapfilled and observed data for aggregated time steps

read_era()

Reads ERA data and extracts time steps corresponding to obs

regfill_flux()

Gapfills flux data using linear regression against met variables

regpredict()

Predict flux values using linear regression parameters

regtrain()

Trains multiple linear regression for flux gap-filling separately for day and night

remove_duplicates()

Removes duplicate indices if a Fluxnet variable is processed more than once

retrieve_atts()

Retrieve variables longnames to be written in NetCDF

retrieve_ranges()

Retrieves acceptable variable ranges

retrieve_units()

Retrieves original and target variable units

retrieve_varinfo()

Retrieves variable information

save_metadata_list_to_csv()

Write multiple site metadata to list at once

save_metadata_to_csv()

Writes metadata to CSV, only updating non-NA data

site_metadata_template()

Empty site metadata template, including only the site code

stop_and_log()

Writes site log and then aborts, reporting error

update_csv_from_web()

Reads all ORNL data into the CSV file

update_metadata()

Updates old metadata with new metadata, ignoring NAs, and warning on differences

update_qc()

Updates QC flags after gap-filling

warn_and_log()

Writes site log and then aborts, reporting error

warn_missing_metadata()

Warns about missing metadata for the site

write_log()

Writes site log
